data.title: Harrison P. Jacobs
data.text:
About

Harrison Jacobs serves as a Vice President for Highland Capital Brokerage. He specializes in providing objective life insurance financial planning strategies and solutions. Harrison works closely with independent financial professionals and those at nationally recognized institutions adding value to their client relationships.

Harrison has over 14 years of experience in the insurance and financial services industry. Having experience in both personal production and brokerage sales, he understands the daily challenges faced by financial professionals. Harrisonâ€™s hands-on approach provides exceptional service and product insight, allowing financial professionals to spend more time in-front of their clients.

Harrison holds a Series 6 (Investment Company and Variable Contracts Products Representative) and Series 63 (Uniform Securities Agent State Law) securities license as well as a Life and Health insurance license. He received a Bachelor of Arts degree from Ohio Wesleyan University. He enjoys golf, soccer, music, and spending time with family and friends in Rock Hall, Maryland.

Harrison, his wife Erika, and their three children, reside in Villanova, Pennsylvania.
